::Shadow Wing::

She was getting nervous about being alone.  She felt helpless and un 
able to do anything about her situation.  Then she felt a twinge of 
courage go through her.  She tried to reopen the connection through 
the link that Veratis had used.  She used a lot of her own energy, 
but managed to open up a small link.  She tried to speak, but it 
didn't work.  She found that through the computer, she could make her 
words appear on the console. It wasn't much, but it was something.  
She tried to tap into other systems and possable find out more about 
her surroundings. But the computer was encoded and she couldn't get 
very far.  She let her words form on the console screen.
"Hello? Anyone there? I need to know about my form. Can my form 
funtion without the DNA inprinting for a short time?" was what she 
had left on the screen for Veratis to find.  She then tried to reach 
a connection to her form. She tried and struggled, but couldn't make 
it work.  The mainframe blocked out most of her efforts.  She tried 
again, but could't find the connection to the 'brain' of the 
potoform. She got one last idea to try before giving up totally.  She 
tried to establish a connection to the body of the protoform.  She 
was able to get a partial link to the arm of the form.  She felt it 
the connection and she could almost feel the arm itself.  She tried 
to raise the arm up slightly.  The arm of the protoform moved up 
about two inches off the table, then back down.  Shadow Wing felt so 
excited that she would have jumped around if she could have.  She 
couldn't help but feel overjoyed at her accomplishment.  never before 
would she take moving and being able to control her own body for 
granted again.  She was extatic.  She printed up on the console,"I 
did it, I made it move, I did it!"
